articles.title: Kalshi Fines Former Gubernatorial Candidate, MrBeast Employee on Prediction Wagers
articles.summary: Kalshi hit a former gubernatorial candidate and a MrBeast employee with fines for violating wagering rules on their prediction market platform. The enforcement action signals Kalshi is cracking down on improper betting behavior as regulators watch how prediction markets police themselves.

articles.title: "Survivor 50" hasn't aired yet, but Kalshi, Polymarket have picked a winner
articles.summary: Prediction markets on Kalshi and Polymarket are already pricing favorites for Survivor's milestone 50th season before it hits the airwaves. This marks another expansion of entertainment betting beyond traditional sports, showing how prediction markets are becoming the go-to platform for literally any outcome people want to speculate on.

articles.title: Kalshi Fines and Suspends MrBeast Employee for Insider Trading
articles.summary: Kalshi hit one of MrBeast's employees with fines and a suspension after catching them trading on inside information about the YouTube star's content or business moves. The case shows prediction markets are serious about policing insider trading as they expand into entertainment and creator economy bets where non-public information can be pure gold.

articles.title: This Looks Like an Insider Bet on Aliens
articles.summary: Someone with inside knowledge appears to be placing unusually large or confident bets on alien disclosure or UFO-related events. This signals either genuine leaked information worth following or a sophisticated pump scheme that could create profitable counter-betting opportunities for sharp prediction market traders.

articles.title: MrBeast editor nabbed by prediction market firm Kalshi for alleged insider trading
articles.summary: Kalshi allegedly caught a MrBeast video editor engaging in insider trading on their platform. This shows prediction markets are starting to face the same manipulation risks as traditional securities markets, which could trigger stricter regulations and verification requirements for traders.

articles.title: Prediction market Kalshi fines MrBeast editor over insider trading
articles.summary: Kalshi hit MrBeast's video editor with fines for insider trading on prediction markets, likely betting on outcomes they knew in advance from unreleased content. This marks one of the first major enforcement actions against insider trading in prediction markets, setting a precedent that could reshape how platforms police information asymmetries between content creators and regular bettors.

articles.title: Kalshi wants a Utah judge to tell state leaders they can’t control betting on prediction markets
articles.summary: Kalshi is asking a federal judge to block Utah officials from interfering with prediction markets, apparently after the state tried to shut down betting activity within its borders. If successful, this could set a precedent that shields prediction markets from state-level crackdowns and clarifies whether federal oversight trumps local gambling laws.

articles.title: An accountant won a big jackpot on Kalshi by betting against DOGE
articles.summary: An accountant scored a massive payout on Kalshi by betting that Dogecoin would tank, proving that financial fundamentals still beat meme coin mania. The win shows prediction markets are attracting serious money from people who actually understand balance sheets, not just crypto Twitter hype.

articles.title: Kalshi Says It’s Busted a MrBeast Staffer for Insider Trading
articles.summary: Kalshi claims it caught a MrBeast employee using inside information to place bets on markets related to the YouTube star's content or business dealings. The case marks prediction markets' first major insider trading bust and could trigger regulatory scrutiny that shapes how platforms police non-public information going forward.

articles.title: Will 'Sinners' win at Oscars? When will Maduro fall? Place your bets.
articles.summary: Prediction markets are taking action on whether Colman Domingo's film "Sing Sing" will snag Oscar gold and when Venezuelan strongman Nicolás Maduro's regime will finally collapse. Both markets reveal how bettors are pricing long-shot cultural moments against geopolitical powder kegs, creating wildly different risk profiles for the same speculative dollar.

articles.title: Predictions, odds of government shutdown end amid Senate vote today
articles.summary: The Senate is voting today on legislation that would likely end the current government shutdown standoff, with prediction markets adjusting their odds accordingly. Bettors who've been tracking shutdown duration and resolution timing are about to see their positions settle as political theater finally gives way to legislative reality.

articles.title: The worrying new gambling trend luring boys to bet on airstrikes, Epstein and aliens
articles.summary: Boys are increasingly placing bets on everything from military conflicts and conspiracy theories to extraterrestrial disclosure through unregulated online platforms. This trend signals how prediction markets are bleeding into pure gambling territory, potentially attracting regulatory crackdowns that could hurt legitimate forecasting platforms.
